= Setting Up Your Sina Weibo Development Environment =

No matter which operating system you are using, you will need essentially the same set of tools:

  * Sun's Java Development Kit (JDK)
  * The Eclipse Integrated Development Environment
  * The Android Software Developer's Kit (SDK)
  * A special Eclipse plugin: the Android Developer Tool (ADT)
  * A subversion plugin for Eclipse: Subclipse
  * The Sina Weibo Developer's Kit (SDK)
